Welcome to Microsoft Community. Regarding to your information I assume that you have some problem of the new profile display. This new feature is related to your Profile type, not your Profile name. Therefore, it can only display two types of profiles: work accounts and personal account. If you do not want to display these, you can go to the website and disable this feature. edge://settings/appearance As for customizing the display name, it seems that Edge currently does not have this feature. After disabling this feature, you can click on this icon and provide feedback for this requirement. If there is anything not clear, please do not hesitate to let me know.
